778890.name: Above: The Fallen OST
778890.description:
Track List:

1. Start of an Adventure (Tutorial Theme) - 3:14
2. The Night King a Cometh (Boss Theme) - 1:56
3. Apai's Temple - 1:48
4. Nights Right Around the Corner - 2:42
5. Sleepy Timey - 0:07

I want to personally thank everyone who has listened to this album, purchased it or the game, or who just supports me unconditionally. Without you this is meaningless.
So from the bottom of my heart, thank you for purchasing.
Sincerely,
Matthew Richard Harnage
